context: Hi there how are you?
Hello, I am doing well! Thank you.
I'm wanting to find out all of the hype with these comic book movies. Where do i start?
What genres do you like
I heard they are all tied together like Thor and Iron Man (2008) are on the same team or something
Yes, exactly and they all are a twist on real human adventures Most are bad science experiments gone wrong.
But Batman movies like The Dark Knight (2008) isn't a part of that?
I like both movies that you mentioned Thor
Then when you bring the The Avengers (2012) into it I get confused haha. Okay I'll watch Thor
Haha well luckily if you watch each movie they do really stand alone.
Good to know lol thank you for your help DC vs Marvel is such a weird world!
The Avengers (2012) are all apart of the same world with individual problems with their gifts That is a good point of view you make. I did not think to mention the different brands of comics
Do the Avengers hang out with Iron Man (2008) and those guys? I'm thinking Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) !!! LOL im sorry
Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) is more like Star Wars (1977)
okay I see. Thank you for explaining. Whenever I try to keep up my boyfriend gets so annoyed. I basically have to wiki everything
The stories of the Universe verses galaxy and worlds. I love them all. They are very entertaining
its good to know they are all separate. have a good one!
Yes you do the same. Try one of the newer stories like Deadpool 2 (2018) you may not be able to tie it into other comic stories. However, you will surely be entertained. you too.
I loved Deadpool (2016)
Well you are gonna love part 2, hands down! It is action packed and full of humor.
Thank you! goodbye!
resp: The comic stories also tend to have really good sound tracks. My favorite is Blade II (2002) series and Triplex (1991)

context.content: Hello
Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or genre?
I'm looking for a chilling, terrifying and suspenseful horror movie, an intriguing and suspenseful mystery, or a thrilling thriller with gripping suspense. Do you have any recommendations?
context.feelings: I hope the recommender understands my preferences and recommends a movie that truly matches what I'm looking for. I don't want to be disappointed again.

context.content: I recommend "Psycho" for a chilling and suspenseful horror movie with a thrilling storyline.
Can you tell me more about "Psycho"? I want to know if it's really chilling, terrifying, and suspenseful.
context.feelings: I'm not sure if "Psycho" covers all the genres I'm looking for. I hope the recommender understands my preferences better next time.

context.content: "Psycho" is a classic horror film directed by Alfred Hitchcock. It's known for its chilling and suspenseful atmosphere, and it's considered one of the greatest horror films of all time. The movie is filled with terrifying moments and a gripping storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
Hmm, "Psycho" sounds interesting, but I'm not sure if it's exactly what I'm looking for. Can you recommend another movie that's more terrifying and chilling?
context.feelings: I'm not sure if "Psycho" is exactly what I'm looking for. It sounds chilling and suspenseful, but I'm not sure if it's terrifying enough for me. I need something that will really scare me. The recommender seems to know a lot about the movie, but I'm not fully convinced yet. I need more options.
